text:
heading this kind of behavior off at the pass is something that’s been on my mind a lot, but i don’t know that i have any good solutions. 

one experience that stands out was in at an interview/coffee scenario where the first thing the candidate said on seeing me was `you’re so young` and he kept repeating it through the meeting
i often wonder why/how people get into that mode. It usually comes off as jealousy or at very least "you couldn't possibly understand the nuance of what we're talking about"
but i think it mainly shows a very limited experience
and in this case it was a great flag for me to end that interview quickly
I've had that happen in an interview too (where I was the candidate). There were several strong signs that led me to get out of there asap.
